name: gretl Binary Datafile
summary: Learn about .GDTB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The data contained in a GDTB file is in binary format, which enables large datasets to be read and written faster. However for smaller datasets around 9 MB or less, the original .GDT plain text format can be used.

description: Datafile used by gretl, an open source econometrics program; stores economic data, which includes observations, variables, and descriptions of the included information, in binary format.
